title: Agro-forestry vs monoculture
desc: On average, using agroforestry was ${avg} %{less|more} effective than monoculture

title: Biochar vs Control
desc: On average, using biochar was ${avg} %{less|more} effective compared to not using it

title: Biofertilization vs control
desc: On average, using biofertilizers was ${avg} %{less|more} effective compared to not using them

title: Genetic diversity vs monoculture
desc: On average, using  diverse cultivar mixes was ${avg} %{less|more} effective compared to monocultures

title: GMO vs non-GMO
desc: On average, GMOs where ${avg} %{less|more} effective compared to non-GMOs

title: Green Manure vs None
desc: On average, using green manure in addition to fertilizers was ${avg} %{less|more} effective than not using it

title: Intercrop vs Monocrop
desc: On average, using intercrops were ${avg} %{less|more} effective compared to monocultures

title: No-Till vs Till
desc: On average, using no-till was ${avg} %{less|more} effective compared to not using it

title: Organic vs Conventional
desc: Organic was, on average, ${avg} %{less|more} effective compared to conventional

title: Organic fertilizer vs. Synthetic fertilizer
desc: On average, using a mix of organic and synthetic nitrogen was ${avg} %{less|more} effective than only using synthetic nitrogen, with substitution rates of 25-75%

title: Slow release vs Conventional
desc: On average, using slow release nitrogen fertilizer was ${avg} %{less|more} effective than using conventional fertilizer

title: Intercrop vs Monocrop (weed)
desc: On average, using intercrops for controlling weeds was ${avg} %{less|more} effective compared to monocultures

title: Wood ammendment vs. None
desc: On average, using wood amendments was ${avg} %{less|more} effective than not using them
